name: Band Together!
description: You’ve just gotten back to your old stomping grounds after a rough falling out with your old band. But it’s time to put the past behind you! Check in on old friends, and meet new ones, as you explore the town. Finny and the Mints won’t mend their split by themselves! Find your six old friends: Finny Minster, TOBO, Snuzzah, Pep Mahstep, Bits, and Bungalow and their even older instruments to put on a reunion show for the ages! With 10 unique locations to explore, and even more odd creatures to meet, what are you waiting for? Time to band together and rock out!
